meanings.definition: A mechanical device used to lift boats out of the water.
meanings.sent1: The boatlifts at the marina help raise boats for maintenance.
meanings.sent2: The boatlifts were essential for moving the boats to dry land.
meanings.sent3: The boatlifts decided to take a break and refused to lift any more boats.
meanings.sent4: The boatlifts worked tirelessly, like giant hands lifting boats to safety.
meanings.sent5: The boatlifts hummed as they carefully lifted each boat out of the water.

meanings.definition: The act of lifting boats out of the water.
meanings.sent1: Watching the boatlifts in action was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The boatlifts made the process of moving boats look easy.
meanings.sent3: The boatlifts threw a party after successfully lifting all the boats.
meanings.sent4: The boatlifts performed their duty with precision and grace.
meanings.sent5: The boatlifts completed the boat removal with efficiency and speed.

meanings.definition: A system for transporting boats by lifting them onto a larger vessel.
meanings.sent1: The boatlifts on the ship helped transfer smaller boats.
meanings.sent2: The boatlifts on the barge were used to load boats for transport.
meanings.sent3: The boatlifts on the yacht decided to go on strike mid-journey.
meanings.sent4: The boatlifts on the carrier ship hoisted boats effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The boatlifts on the transport vessel ensured a smooth transfer of boats.
